channel.title: Comments on: SQL Advent 2012 Day 23: Get the tools you need to be more productive
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: DevelopIntelligence
item.dc:creator: DevelopIntelligence
item.description: Asking around and investing in trial periods is great. Not every tool is going to be a must-have or actually save you time, but you won't know until you give it a go. And like you said, once you find out what was missing you'll never go back.
item.content:encoded: Asking around and investing in trial periods is great. Not every tool is going to be a must-have or actually save you time, but you won’t know until you give it a go. And like you said, once you find out what was missing you’ll never go back.
